libro.resumen: En esta nueva edici?n se agreg? un cap?tulo independiente sobre arquitecturas para reflejar el progreso que se ha dado en la organizaci?n de sistemas distribuidos. Otra diferencia importante es que ahora existe mucho m?s material acerca de sistemas descentralizados, en especial sobre computaci?n de igual a igual (peer-to-peer)
Database System Concepts by Silberschatz, Korth and Sudarshan is now in its 6th edition and is one of the cornerstone texts of database education.

JavaScript was written to give readers an accurate, concise examination of JavaScript objects and their supporting nuances, such as complex values, primitive values, scope, inheritance, the head object, and more.

Appropriate for courses titled Computer Networking or Introduction to Networking at both the undergraduate and graduate level in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, CIS, MIS, and Business Departments.
